attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kershaw wrote some very good songs. Wouldn't It Be Good To Be In Your Shoes is a profound statement on the nihilistically covetous nature of consumerism in the UK during the 80s. His hair was outstanding. And his song The Riddle was as profound mystery as the resurrection of the so called 'Christ'

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
